name: Homebrew32
storyline:
In an attempt to share my project with as many people as possible I did my best with the tools I had to localize the game in 12 languages. I however do not speak 12 languages... So I ask you to have sympathy for my translations as they are an attempt to communicate with people from all over the world. I beg you to send me any changes or errors you might find, my goal is to make this game as good as possible. Thank you for reaching out!

After being sucked into your PC by a mysterious antivirus, take control of a multi barreled tank to confront the bugs head-on. Navigate your way through the motherboard, battling boss viruses to unlock new zones. Keep an eye on the 'UPGRADE MACHINE', which bestows upgrades every 1-10 seconds. Accumulate points from previous runs to enhance the upgrade machine further and gain the upper hand in your fight against the digital threats.
summary: Drawn into your PC by a mysterious antivirus, control a 1-5 barrel tank. Navigate the motherboard, defeating boss viruses to unlock new zones. The 'UPGRADE MACHINE' grants enhancements every 1-10 seconds. Use points from previous runs to upgrade it and gain an edge.
